about me

Let me tell you few things about me..

bio

My name is Godwin Micheals and I am a full-stack Web Application Developer and Software Developer, currently living in Nigeria, LA. I have a Bachelor of Science in Computer Science from Northeastern University, And a Higher National Diploma in Mechanical Engineering from YabaTech, and my primary focus and inspiration for my studies is Web Development. I am both driven and self-motivated, and I am constantly experimenting with new technologies and techniques. I am very passionate about Web Development, and strive to better myself as a developer, and the development community as a whole.

caterax

Full Stack Developer

Working as a full-stack javascript developer for caterax made me very used to alot of js frameworks, i gained alot of experience using, react And material-UI for front end, node.js for my backend.

caterax

I have alot of experience with HTML, CSS, SASS, Font awesome, JQuery and Vanilla javascript, skills which i utilize to create amazing front-end application.
